description_html:
Inspiration
Smart arises from our passion for wood, combining artisanal techniques with constant research.
Description
Smart is presented as high and low stool, which perfectly complements the chair version with its
simple and light design.
Versions
It is constructed of solid beech and comes in three different tones, 311, 372 and 381. Its seat is offered
in oak finish, upholstered or with woven bands in sand and black colors. Its frame is reinforced with
round steel tube locks in chrome finish.
